bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester

Class Harvester

  • java.lang.Object
    • bbaw.wsp.parser.harvester.Harvester
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileSystemHarvester, MySQLHarvester, WebHarvester

    public abstract class Harvester
extends java.lang.Object
    This interface is the API for all Harvester.
    Author:
    Sascha Feldmann (wsp-shk1)

    • Method Detail

      • harvest

        public abstract java.util.Set<java.lang.String> harvest(java.lang.String startURI)
                                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Harvest an WebResource located by an URL and return the resources based on that URL.
        Parameters:
        startURI - - the URL to begin the harvest
        Returns:
        a set of String that contains all accepted resources
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the startURL does not exist
